text: Soni Jwalakwe ni Ajula juŵagumbile mawunde ni mataka m’masiku nsano nalimo, soni Arishi Jakwe (Chindanda Chaulungu) jaliji pachanya pa mesi, (jwaatesile yalakweyi) kuti an’diije ŵanganyammwe yanti ŵani mwa jenumanja ŵatapanganye masengo gambone nnope. Nambo naga n’di mwasalile yanti: “Chisimu ŵanganyammwe chinchiukulidwa panyuma pakuwa.” Aŵala ŵakufuulu akutiji: “Nganiuŵatu walakweu ikaŵeje usaŵi wakuonechela.”
